forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 55. North northwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 37 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

weather_report:
As the night settles over Downtown San Francisco, an inviting calm envelops the city, yet a brisk wind whispers through the streets. The serene clarity of the evening is palpable, with temperatures reclining gracefully around the mid-fifties. While the north-northwest breeze dances, occasionally stirring gusts up to 37 mph, the air remains refreshingly crisp—perfect for an outing under the stars, perhaps with a warm drink in hand. 

Looking ahead to the morrow, the sun is set to embrace San Francisco, offering a bright, cheerful day. With a high reaching into the upper sixties, the warmth will softy linger after the sun takes its throne, fading slightly as afternoon arrives. The north-northwest wind will moderate yet still provide a gentle reminder of the ocean’s presence, inviting jacket-wearers to revel in the delightful atmosphere. Given the clear skies, embarking on an afternoon walk along the Embarcadero or exploring the quaint alleys of North Beach could be rewarded with vibrant autumnal hues reflected in the bay—an experience both soothing and invigorating. Layering a light sweater with a comfortable long-sleeve shirt will ensure comfort throughout the day, blending practicality with a sense of ease as you step into the urban tapestry of this alluring city.
